about_the_game:
The Most Creative Racing Game!

Create your own vehicles, characters, and tracks by combining simple shapes—without any restrictions! (This feature is not available in the demo.)

For example:

  • Craft characters with multiple heads, any number of eyes, arms, and legs—or even one or more tails!

  • Design vehicles out of any object, as long as you add wheels!

  • Build tracks in any shape, as long as they have at least two checkpoints! Race across a laptop, a bedroom, a beach, a starship, a car, a horse... anything!

  • Customize checkpoints and direction signs to look like trees, objects, characters, or whatever you imagine!

Imagine, build, and race with your own creations!

What's in the Demo?

  • Three racing tracks – Perform stunts, push opponents, and rush to the finish line as fast as you can!

  • Endless fun – Race as much as you want, unlocking new vehicles and models by winning races and setting record times.

  • Track customization – Adjust colors, start lines, checkpoints, and direction signs to make tracks your own.

  • Coming soon – Local multiplayer and Remote Play Together!

Ready to race? Go!

  • Race solo or up to 4 players in local split-screen multiplayer! (coming soon in the Demo)

Craft your racing tracks (not in the Demo)

  • Edit existing tracks or create new ones from scratch in any theme (cars, beach, bedroom, workshop, etc.)

  • Add jumps, decorations, and obstacles.

  • Use funny models as checkpoints and direction signs.

Create your characters and opponents (not in the Demo)

  • Customize any character or create your own. Bring any idea you can imagine to life, like a creature with a robot body and two animal heads. You choose!

Build new Vehicles (not in the Demo)

  • Choose from classic options like karts, buggies, racing cars, and trucks.

  • Or go for funnier ones like a bath vehicle, a sofa car, or a tiger rover. Anything is possible!

Wishlist now!

  • Click the Wishlist button now!

Try the Demo!

  • Try the demo and let me know your ideas!

The Most Creative Racing Game!

Create your own vehicles, characters, and tracks by combining simple shapes—without any restrictions! (This feature is not available in the demo.)

For example:

  • Craft characters with multiple heads, any number of eyes, arms, and legs—or even one or more tails!

  • Customize checkpoints and direction signs to look like trees, objects, characters, or whatever you imagine!

Imagine, build, and race with your own creations!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Crafty Racer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7.1 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7.1 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Race through fantastic Worlds, with your custom rides! Create your own epic Vehicles, Characters and Tracks, any way you want! Then race to victory solo or with up to 3 friends!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Hindi, Persian, Swahili
